title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 240.3 - Eligibility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 240.3 - Eligibility

State Regulations

For the purposes of this Part, only an authorized applicant
shall be eligible to apply for the Empire State Musical and Theatrical

Production Tax Credit. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
240.3

Adopted

New

York State Register August 12, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 32, eff. 8/12/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
